con:interface.name: CARB Port
con:interface.con:description: This application provides ORU facilities for VW Group vehicles

con:part.con:content:
{"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"CARB Port","description":"This application provides ORU facilities for VW Group vehicles","contact":{"name":"ESR Labs","url":"https://esrlabs.com","email":"contact@esrlabs.com"},"license":{"name":"Copyright (c) 2020 ESR Labs. All rights reserved.

"},"version":"2.0.0"},"servers":[{"url":"https://docs.demo.orunext.com/carb/api","description":"Generated server url"}],"security":[{"bearer-jwt":["read","write"]}],"paths":{"/carb/data/archive/searches":{"post":{"tags":["ArchivedCarbData"],"summary":"Search archived CARB data","operationId":"searchArchivedCarbData","requestBody":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ArchivedCarbDataQuery"}}},"required":true},"responses":{"default":{"description":"default response","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ArchivedCarbDataView"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/carb/version":{"get":{"description":"Get version info for Carb port","responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"example":""}}}}}},"/carb/data/archive/{updateId}/download":{"get":{"description":"Download archived CARB data","parameters":[{"name":"updateId","in":"path","required":true,"style":"simple","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}],"responses":{"default":{"description":"Default response"}}}},"/carb/data/{updateId}/download":{"get":{"description":"Download CARB data","parameters":[{"name":"updateId","in":"path","required":true,"style":"simple","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}],"responses":{"default":{"description":"Default response"}}}},"/carb/data/searches":{"post":{"description":"Search CARB data","requestBody":{"content":{"application/json":{"example":"{
 "columns" : [ "id", "name", "state" ],
 "columnConditions" : [ {
 "column" : "id",
 "operator" : "eq",
 "value" : 123,
 "value2" : 789
 } ],
 "sortBy" : "id",
 "sortDirection" : "asc",
 "start" : 0,
 "limit" : 10,
 "count" : true,
 "noDefaultLimit" : true
}"}}},"responses":{"default":{"description":"Default response"}}}},"/carb/data/searches/export":{"description":"","post":{"description":"Export CARB data in CSV format","requestBody":{"content":{"application/json":{"example":"{
 "columns" : [ "id", "name", "state" ],
 "columnConditions" : [ {
 "column" : "id",
 "operator" : "eq",
 "value" : 123,
 "value2" : 789
 } ],
 "sortBy" : "id",
 "sortDirection" : "asc",
 "start" : 0,
 "limit" : 10,
 "count" : true,
 "noDefaultLimit" : true
}"}}},"responses":{"default":{"description":"Default response"}}}}},"components":{"schemas":{"CarbDataView":{"type":"object","properties":{"count":{"type":"integer","description":"The total row count","format":"int32","example":123},"vin":{"type":"string","example":"BAUOTATEST0000004"},"referenceId":{"type":"string","example":"ABCD/01/CM2231231"},"brand":{"type":"string","example":"Audi"},"updateId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"4242ef30-b07d-11ea-b3de-0242ac130004"},"resultVehicleTimestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2019-01-22T17:23:45Z"},"dispatchTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2019-01-22T17:23:45Z"},"uploadData":{"type":"array","example":"svzVLxNG+7FE7F6IFr2onMfkscD0r8JjAZElcGkPdwM=","items":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}},"notEmpty":{"type":"boolean"}}},"CarbDataQuery":{"type":"object","properties":{"columns":{"type":"array","example":["id","name","state"],"items":{"type":"string","example":"["id","name","state"]","enum":["VIN","REFERENCE_ID","BRAND","ERROR","UPDATE_ID","UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP","UPLOAD_DATA","DISPATCH_TIME"]}},"columnConditions":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/CarbDataQueryColumns"}},"sortBy":{"type":"string","example":"id","enum":["VIN","REFERENCE_ID","BRAND","ERROR","UPDATE_ID","UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP","UPLOAD_DATA","DISPATCH_TIME"]},"sortDirection":{"type":"string","example":"asc","enum":["asc","desc"]},"start":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"limit":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":10},"count":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"noDefaultLimit":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}},"CarbDataQueryColumns":{"required":["column","operator","value"],"type":"object","properties":{"column":{"type":"string","example":"id","enum":["VIN","REFERENCE_ID","BRAND","ERROR","UPDATE_ID","UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP","UPLOAD_DATA","DISPATCH_TIME"]},"operator":{"type":"string","description":"Numbers, Strings, Dates: eq, be, lt, le, ge, gt,
Strings, Dates: matches, startsWith, endsWith, contains, containsIgnoringCase, doesNotContain,
Dates (requires value2): between","example":"eq","enum":["eq","ne","lt","le","ge","gt","matches","notMatches","similar","notSimilar","startsWith","endsWith","notEqualTo","likeRegex","stringEquals","stringNotEquals","contains","containsIgnoringCase","doesNotContain","doesNotContainIgnoringCase","between","in","notIn"]},"value":{"type":"object","example":123},"value2":{"type":"object","description":"Required for the 'between' operator","example":789}}},"ArchivedCarbDataView":{"type":"object","properties":{"count":{"type":"integer","description":"The total row count","format":"int32","example":123},"updateId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"4242ef30-b07d-11ea-b3de-0242ac130004"},"vin":{"type":"string","example":"BAUOTATEST0000004"},"referenceId":{"type":"string","example":"ABCD/01/CM2231231"},"brand":{"type":"string","example":"Audi"},"resultVehicleTimestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2019-01-22T17:23:45Z"},"dispatchTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2019-01-22T17:23:45Z"},"uploadData":{"type":"array","example":"svzVLxNG+7FE7F6IFr2onMfkscD0r8JjAZElcGkPdwM=","items":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}},"notEmpty":{"type":"boolean"}}},"ArchivedCarbDataQuery":{"type":"object","properties":{"columns":{"type":"array","example":["id","name","state"],"items":{"type":"string","example":"["id","name","state"]","enum":["UPDATE_ID","VIN","REFERENCE_ID","BRAND","ERROR","UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP","UPLOAD_DATA","DISPATCH_TIME"]}},"columnConditions":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/ArchivedCarbDataQueryColumns"}},"sortBy":{"type":"string","example":"id","enum":["UPDATE_ID","VIN","REFERENCE_ID","BRAND","ERROR","UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP","UPLOAD_DATA","DISPATCH_TIME"]},"sortDirection":{"type":"string","example":"asc","enum":["asc","desc"]},"start":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"limit":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":10},"count":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"noDefaultLimit":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}},"ArchivedCarbDataQueryColumns":{"required":["column","operator","value"],"type":"object","properties":{"column":{"type":"string","example":"id","enum":["UPDATE_ID","VIN","REFERENCE_ID","BRAND","ERROR","UPLOAD_TIMESTAMP","UPLOAD_DATA","DISPATCH_TIME"]},"operator":{"type":"string","description":"Numbers, Strings, Dates: eq, be, lt, le, ge, gt,
Strings, Dates: matches, startsWith, endsWith, contains, containsIgnoringCase, doesNotContain,
Dates (requires value2): between","example":"eq","enum":["eq","ne","lt","le","ge","gt","matches","notMatches","similar","notSimilar","startsWith","endsWith","notEqualTo","likeRegex","stringEquals","stringNotEquals","contains","containsIgnoringCase","doesNotContain","doesNotContainIgnoringCase","between","in","notIn"]},"value":{"type":"object","example":123},"value2":{"type":"object","description":"Required for the 'between' operator","example":789}}},"VersionInfo":{"type":"object","properties":{"buildTime":{"type":"string"},"version":{"type":"string"}}}},"securitySchemes":{"bearer-jwt":{"type":"http","scheme":"bearer","bearerFormat":"JWT"}}}}
